question: Which drugs target both HDAC8 and HDAC9?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[r1:TARGETS]->(g1:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g1.symbol) = toLower('HDAC8')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('HDAC8'))
MATCH (t)-[r2:TARGETS]->(g2:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g2.symbol) = toLower('HDAC9')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g2.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('HDAC9'))
RETURN
  g1.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  r1.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r1.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r1.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r1.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Which drugs target biomarkers of resistance to Platinum Compound in Ovarian Serous Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Platinum Compound')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Platinum Compound'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Platinum Compound')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'serous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Platinum Compound')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Show treatments hitting ALK that have biomarker evidence in Non-small Cell Lung Carcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Erlotinib in Lung Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Show treatments for TOP1 excluding HDAC1 that have biomarker evidence in Ureteral Small Cell Carcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('HDAC1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('HDAC1'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ureter' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ABL1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ABL1'))
MATCH (v:Variant)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Show treatments hitting ALK that have biomarker evidence in Stromal Tumour Of Gastrointestinal Tract.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('ALK')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gastrointestinal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'stromal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'tumor'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: In Naevocarcinoma, which genes confer resistance to Vemurafenib or Dabrafenib?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Vemurafenib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dabrafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vemurafenib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dabrafenib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vemurafenib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dabrafenib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which drugs target biomarkers of resistance to Dasatinib in Naevocarcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Dasatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Dasatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: List resistance genes for Platinum Doublet or Dacomitinib in Non-small Cell Lung Cancer.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Platinum Doublet')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Dacomitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Platinum Doublet'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dacomitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Platinum Doublet')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dacomitinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Decitabine')
)

  t.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,

LIMIT 100

question: In Non-small Cell Lung Carcinoma, which genes confer resistance to Crizotinib or Cabozantinib?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Crizotinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cabozantinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Crizotinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cabozantinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Crizotinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cabozantinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Docetaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Docetaxel'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Docetaxel')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Docetaxel')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target YES1 for variants that cause resistance in CML - Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('YES1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('YES1'))
MATCH (v:Variant)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List resistance genes for Larotrectinib or Platinum Doublet in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Larotrectinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Platinum Doublet')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Larotrectinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Platinum Doublet'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Larotrectinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Platinum Doublet')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'head' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'and' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neck'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Erlotinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes affect response to Tazemetostat in Diffuse Large B-cell Lymphoma Germinal Center B-cell Type?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Tazemetostat')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Tazemetostat'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Tazemetostat')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'diffuse' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'large' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphoma' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'germinal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'center' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'type'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which treatments target resistance biomarkers for Olaparib in Primary Breast Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Olaparib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Olaparib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Olaparib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

)

  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,

LIMIT 100

question: What genes are sensitivity biomarkers for Hyperthermic Intraperitoneal Chemotherapy in Advanced Malignant Mesothelioma Of Peritoneum?

question: Which genes predict resistance to Trastuzumab or Panobinostat in Breast Tumor?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Trastuzumab')

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Panobinostat'))

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Panobinostat')

question: In Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma, which genes confer resistance to PHA-665752 or MUC1-targeted Peptide GO-203-2C?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('PHA-665752')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('MUC1-targeted Peptide GO-203-2C')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PHA-665752'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('MUC1-targeted Peptide GO-203-2C'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('PHA-665752')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('MUC1-targeted Peptide GO-203-2C')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Nintedanib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Nintedanib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Nintedanib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: In Non-small Cell Lung Cancer, which genes confer resistance to Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor or Crizotinib?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Crizotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Crizotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Crizotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sirolimus'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sirolimus')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Alpelisib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Alpelisib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Alpelisib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Alpelisib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

)

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Erlotinib or Bafetinib in Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Bafetinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Bafetinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Bafetinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colorectal'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Pembrolizumab')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('POLE3'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ureter' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: In Non-small Cell Lung Cancer, which genes confer resistance to Trametinib or Rociletinib?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Trametinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Rociletinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trametinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Rociletinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trametinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Rociletinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('EML4')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('EML4'))
WITH t, r, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
RETURN
  gi.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes affect response to Anti-VEGF Monoclonal Antibody in Renal Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Anti-VEGF Monoclonal Antibody')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Anti-VEGF Monoclonal Antibody'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Anti-VEGF Monoclonal Antibody')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'renal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Give PMIDs for EGFR I462K-mediated resistance to Cetuximab.
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'EGFR I462K'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cetuximab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cetuximab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cetuximab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: For resistance to Pembrolizumab in Colon Carcinoma, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Pembrolizumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pembrolizumab'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pembrolizumab')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Pembrolizumab')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: List therapies targeting TOP1 (not FGFR4) with evidence in Ureter Small Cell Carcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('FGFR4')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FGFR4'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ureter' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Selumetinib in Melanoma.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Selumetinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Selumetinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selumetinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )

  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,

LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,

WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN

  gene_symbol,

LIMIT 100

question: For resistance to Trametinib in Uveal Melanoma, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:

)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Larotrectinib in Solid Tumor.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Larotrectinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Larotrectinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Larotrectinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'solid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'tumor'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Larotrectinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are resistance biomarkers for Regorafenib Anhydrous or Panitumumab in Colorectal Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Regorafenib Anhydrous')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Panitumumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Regorafenib Anhydrous'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Panitumumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Regorafenib Anhydrous')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Panitumumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colorectal'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which drugs hit TOP1 but not EML4 with evidence in Ureter Small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('EML4')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('EML4'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ureter' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
